com.intel.icecp.core.misc

Interface Configuration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationAttributeAdapter, ConfigurationImpl
    Deprecated. 
    this API will be replaced by the Attributes API in 0.11.*; TODO remove this

    public interface Configuration
    A configuration object; the purpose of this interface is to hide the mechanics of loading configuration data from a channel so that it may be used in a variety of places throughout the application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T get(String propertyPath)
      Deprecated. 
      Retrieve a value from the configuration file; if not loaded, the configuration will load itself synchronously.
      Channel<ConfigurationMessage> getChannel()
      Deprecated. 
       
      <T> T getOrDefault(T defaultValue, String... propertyPaths)
      Deprecated. 
      Retrieve a value from the configuration file or return the default value given if not found; this method will search each property path from left to right.
      <T> T getOrNull(String propertyPath)
      Deprecated. 
      Retrieve a value from the configuration file or return null if not found; if not loaded, the configuration will load itself synchronously.
      Set<String> keySet()
      Deprecated. 
       
      void load()
      Deprecated. 
      Load the configuration file from the assigned channel, see getChannel(); if called again, this will force the configuration to retrieve its latest version.
      void put(String propertyPath, Object value)
      Deprecated. 
      Change a value in the configuration file; note that changes will not be persisted until save() is called.
      void save()
      Deprecated. 
      Persist any changes to the configuration; this will publish the changes as a new version on the channel.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        void load()
   throws ChannelIOException
        Deprecated. 
        Load the configuration file from the assigned channel, see getChannel(); if called again, this will force the configuration to retrieve its latest version.
        Throws:
        ChannelIOException - if the channel fails

      • save

        void save()
   throws ChannelIOException
        Deprecated. 
        Persist any changes to the configuration; this will publish the changes as a new version on the channel.
        Throws:
        ChannelIOException - if the channel fails

      • get

        <T> T get(String propertyPath)
   throws PropertyNotFoundException
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieve a value from the configuration file; if not loaded, the configuration will load itself synchronously.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the inferred type to return
        Parameters:
        propertyPath - the path to the value, e.g. prop1.prop2.prop3
        Returns:
        the property value
        Throws:
        PropertyNotFoundException - if the path is not found

      • getOrNull

        <T> T getOrNull(String propertyPath)
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieve a value from the configuration file or return null if not found; if not loaded, the configuration will load itself synchronously.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the inferred type to return
        Parameters:
        propertyPath - the path to the value, e.g. prop1.prop2.prop3
        Returns:
        the property value

      • getOrDefault

        <T> T getOrDefault(T defaultValue,
                   String... propertyPaths)
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieve a value from the configuration file or return the default value given if not found; this method will search each property path from left to right.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the inferred type to return
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - the value to return if no path is found
        propertyPaths - a list of paths to values, e.g. prop1.prop2.prop3
        Returns:
        the property value

      • put

        void put(String propertyPath,
         Object value)
        Deprecated. 
        Change a value in the configuration file; note that changes will not be persisted until save() is called. If necessary, this method will create the path structure.
        Parameters:
        propertyPath - the path to the value, e.g. prop1.prop2.prop3
        value - the property value

      • getChannel

        Channel<ConfigurationMessage> getChannel()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        a reference to the underlying channel; this may be permission-protected by implementing classes.

      • keySet

        Set<String> keySet()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        Current set of valid configuration parameters(note, static snapshot!)
